Detailed Description

To read binary dump output from WDSS-II (http://www.wdssii.org/).

Author:

static Pair<LatLonGrid,Date> edu.ou.asgbook.dataset.SeviriInfraredTemperature.read ( File  f  )  throws IOException, ParseException [static] 

00032                                                                                         {
00033         // parse filename: eg: MSG_20050105-150000_556x1111_60.00_-10.00_Channel_09_0.027_0.027.llg
00034         String[] pieces = f.getName().replace(".llg", "").split("_");
00035         int pieceno = 0;
00036         pieceno++; // typeName ignored
00037         String date = pieces[pieceno++];
00038         String[] dimpieces = pieces[pieceno++].split("x");
00039         int numrows = Integer.parseInt(dimpieces[0]);
00040         int numcols = Integer.parseInt(dimpieces[1]);
00041         float nwlat = Float.parseFloat(pieces[pieceno++]);
00042         float nwlon = Float.parseFloat(pieces[pieceno++]);
00043         ++pieceno; // subtype ignored
00044         int numleft = pieces.length - pieceno - 2;
00045         pieceno += numleft; // subtype has an underscore
00046         float deltalat = Float.parseFloat(pieces[pieceno++]);
00047         float deltalon = Float.parseFloat(pieces[pieceno++]);
00048         
00049         // read in LatLonGrid
00050         FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(f);
00051         byte[] bytes = new byte[numrows*numcols];
00052         fis.read(bytes);
00053         LatLonGrid grid = new LatLonGrid(numrows, numcols, 0, new LatLon(nwlat,nwlon), deltalat, deltalon);
00054         int index = 0;
00055         for (int i=0; i < numrows; ++i){
00056             for (int j=0; j < numcols; ++j){
00057                 int value = 256 + bytes[index++]; // 0 to 255
00058                 int reversed = 256 - value; // assign higher value to colder pixels
00059                 grid.setValue(i,j, reversed);
00060             }
00061         }
00062         
00063         // format date
00064         SimpleDateFormat df = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMdd-HHmmSS");
00065         Date gridTime = df.parse(date);
00066         
00067         System.out.println("Read grid at " + gridTime);
00068         return new Pair<LatLonGrid,Date>(grid,gridTime);
00069     }

static Pair<LatLonGrid,Date> [] edu.ou.asgbook.dataset.SeviriInfraredTemperature.readAll ( File  dir  )  throws IOException, ParseException [static] 

00071                                                                                                {
00072         File[] files = dir.listFiles(new FileFilter(){
00073             @Override
00074             public boolean accept(File f) {
00075                 return f.getName().endsWith(".llg");
00076             }
00077         });
00078         @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
00079         Pair<LatLonGrid,Date>[] result = new Pair[files.length];
00080         for (int i=0; i < result.length; ++i){
00081             result[i] = read(files[i]);
00082         }
00083         return result;
00084     }
